snippet.title: Pocket City Trailer #1 (2018 City Building Game for iOS & Android)
snippet.description:
Become mayor and build a city! Pocket City is a city building game for iOS and Android, available now. No microtransactions or annoying timers! Pocket City aims to capture the fun of city building on mobile without IAPs. 

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/pocket-city/id1330451888?mt=8
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.codebrewgames.pocketcitygame&hl=en_US

Featuring in-depth city building action optimized for mobile/touch devices. Grow your city from a small town to a bustling metropolis. Keep your citizens happy by managing traffic, environment, and preparing for emergencies.

Designate zones, build roads,  build public services, recreation spots and more! Complete quests to earn XP to level up your city.

Thanks for taking a look at my game! Pocket City is primarily a solo project by a single developer.
